body.name: LESAUCE Full LED License Plate Light Tag Light For 2003-2018 Dodge RAM 1500 2500 3500 Pickup Truck, 6000K White, Smoke Lens, Tag Lamp Assembly Replacement, 2 PCS
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 31 mins
features: [ Full SMD LED, 300% Brightness Improved] Built-in full high power SMD LED chips, LESAUCE LED license plate lights for Ram are 300% brighter than OEM tag lights, improving the visibility on rear license plate light especially driving at night

[ Plug N Play, 10 Min Installation] LESAUCE LED tag light for Dodge 1500 are 1:1 the same size as OEM tag lights. Simply remove original 194 halogen bulbs and connect the plug. Only take 10 min to upgrade your halogen to LED w/o any modification

[ High Quality Housing, IP68 Waterproof] Different from poor quality plastic, LESAUCE upgraded to PC housing. IP68 waterproof can be applied to foggy, rainy, snowy, dusty all weather conditions, reducing the LED license plate lights’ replacement

[ 99% Canbus Ready, No Error Warning] As Dodge is a sensitive car, our package contains two small decoders to solve the error problem. If there is still any canbus question, please get in touch with us from Amazon and we will solve the problem

[ LESAUCE LED License Plate Light Fitment] For Dodge: 2002-2010 Dodge RAM 1500, 2003-2010 Dodge RAM 2500/3500; For RAM: 2010-2018 RAM 1500/2500/3500, 2019-2022 RAM 1500 Classic. Please check your car’s year and order the right type

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Have you encountered any of these annoying moments? When reversing outdoors, the backup camera has no night vision function and the dim original license plate light does not provide illumination, making it difficult to reverse！When driving on the road, it is necessary to let our license plate to been seen clearly, but we may be getting pulled over for an obscured license plate!!Because of its short lifespan, one light bulb flashes while driving, and you have to change the light bulb frequently and may even be fined for it!!! THAT’S ENOUGH!!

Have you encountered any of these annoying moments? When reversing outdoors, the backup camera has no night vision function and the dim original license plate light does not provide illumination, making it difficult to reverse！When driving on the road, it is necessary to let our license plate to been seen clearly, but we may be getting pulled over for an obscured license plate!!Because of its short lifespan, one light bulb flashes while driving, and you have to change the light bulb frequently and may even be fined for it!!! THAT’S ENOUGH!!

Come On And Try LESAUCE LED Tag Lights For Dodge! LESAUCE Rear LED License Plate Bulbs Will Bring Your RAM 1500 A GREAT New Look! If you don't know where to start, let's take a look at the easiest upgrade: UPGRADE YOUR LICENSE PLATE LIGHT TO LED! Although the license plate light is an easy to be ignored, it plays a very important role in our driving process. LESAUCE LED license plate light is a quick and easy way to dress up your pickup truck or car. In just minutes you can replace your plain old license light with the modern look of an license plate light. Especially driving on dark nights or in bad weather, a bright enough license plate light will help illuminate the rear of the car to prevent rear-end collisions!

1:1 Same Size as OEM and 300% Brightness Improved LESAUCE LED license plate lights are the same size as OEM so that you don't need any other tools to replace it. 18 SMD LED chips make LESAUCE LED tag lights' brightness 300% improved, making sure bright enough at night or in bad weather No Radio Error As Dodge is a sensitive car, LESAUCE LED license plate lights come with a pair of decoders to prevent decoding problems. We also upgrade the IC driver to reduce the possibility of decoding problems. If still happened, please get in touch with us and we will solve it No Polarity And Easy Installation LESAUCE LED tag lights have the same connector and socket type as OEM lights. Simply remove the 194 halogen bulbs and and connect the plug. If you don't know how to install, please don't worry, the following parts will show how to install it. Safer Driving 300% Brighter than OEM and more than 50,000 hrs lifespan will make the driving safer. The waterproof coefficient of IP68 makes LESAUCE LED tag lights more suitable for various weathers, such as fog, rain and snow, etc.
How To Install LESAUCE LED License Plate Light For Dodge RAM 1500

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure it's water proof
reviews.reviewText: These are nice lights. I would advise you to purchase the tented lens if your back up camera is attached to license plate due to brightness. Decent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unplug the old one plus in new one
reviews.reviewText: Ez to install. A pin pulled out and pushed in. On the light. Good to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is an acceptable replacement and lights are very bright. The lens plate is not tinted as in the photo , it is clear. The new connectors are very tight to push into receptacle inline.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars License plate, LED
reviews.reviewText: So very easy to install. It looks good. Nice lighting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice and bright
reviews.reviewText: nice and bright and fits like stock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way to Bright
reviews.reviewText: These are not as advertised. They are extremely bright more in the category of reverse lights than license plate, lights that would mount seamlessly in to a Ram bumper. They may be even more of a headlight than a back up light. Unfortunately, for me, I was unable to return them as they only had a two week return window, and by the time I was able to install them that window had passed. So now I’m stuck with some lights I don’t need, and that don’t work. I would suggest buying elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were a very easy install and a good upgrade choice. Definitely recommend if you still have the stock lights in!
